import React from "react"; import loginImg from "../../login.svg"; class Register extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { firstName: null, lastName: null, email: null, password: null, passwordConfirm: null, team: null, permission: null } this.changeValue = this.changeValue.bind(this) } changeValue(name,value) { this.setState({ [name] : value}); } render() { return (
this.changeValue(e.target.name,e.target.value)} />
this.changeValue(e.target.name,e.target.value)} />
this.changeValue(e.target.name,e.target.value)}/>
this.changeValue(e.target.name,e.target.value)}/>
this.changeValue(e.target.name,e.target.value)}/>
); } } export default Register
